frontmatter.title: 笔记：Basefold 在 List Decoding 下的 Soundness 证明

children.value: 在上一篇文章《Basefold 在 List Decoding 下的 Soundness 证明概览》中，梳理了 [H24] 论文中 soundness 证明的思路，本篇文章将沿着这个思路深入论文中的证明细节，主要是 [H24, Lemma 1] 的证明，其证明了 Basefold 协议在 commit 阶段的 soundness error。
[H24, Lemma 1] (Soundness commit phase). Take a proximity parameter

children.html: θ=1−(1+12⋅m)⋅ρ\theta=1-\left(1 + \frac{1}{2 \cdot m}\right) \cdot \sqrt{\rho}θ=1−(1+2⋅m1​)⋅ρ​
m≥3m\geq3m≥3

children.value: . Suppose that a (possibly computationally unbounded) algorithm

children.value: 上面满足的条件可以写为

children.html: Pr⁡[λr+1:∃pr+1′∈Fr+1′ s.t. agreeνr((1−λr+1)⋅fr,0′+λr+1⋅fr,1′,pr+1′)≥α]>ε(Ci+1,1,Br+1,θ)\begin{aligned} \Pr \left[ \lambda_{r+1}: \quad \begin{array}{c} \exists p_{r + 1}' \in \mathcal{F}_{r+1}' \text{ s.t. } \\ \mathrm{agree}_{\nu_r}((1 - \lambda_{r + 1}) \cdot f_{r,0}' + \lambda_{r + 1} \cdot f_{r,1}', p_{r + 1}') \ge \alpha \end{array} \right] > \varepsilon(\mathcal{C}_{i + 1}, 1, B_{r + 1}, \theta) \end{aligned}Pr[λr+1​:∃pr+1′​∈Fr+1′​ s.t. agreeνr​​((1−λr+1​)⋅fr,0′​+λr+1​⋅fr,1′​,pr+1′​)≥α​]>ε(Ci+1​,1,Br+1​,θ)​

children.value: 这也就满足了 [H24, Theorem 4] 带权重的 correlated agreement 定理的条件，因此可以得到存在多项式

Pr(ωr+1,ωr+2,…,ωn)=(1−ωr+1)⋅Pr,0(ωr+2,…,ωn)+ωr+1⋅Pr,1(ωr+2,…,ωn)=(1−ωr+1)⋅Λr(0)+ωr+1⋅Λr(1)=L(ωr+1,0)⋅Λr(0)+L(ωr+1,1)⋅Λr(1)\begin{aligned} P_r(\omega_{r + 1}, \omega_{r + 2}, \ldots, \omega_n) & = (1 - \omega_{r + 1}) \cdot P_{r,0}(\omega_{r+2}, \ldots, \omega_{n}) + \omega_{r + 1} \cdot P_{r,1}(\omega_{r+2}, \ldots, \omega_{n}) \\ & = (1 - \omega_{r + 1}) \cdot \Lambda_r(0) + \omega_{r + 1} \cdot \Lambda_r(1) \\ & = L(\omega_{r + 1}, 0) \cdot \Lambda_r(0) + L(\omega_{r + 1}, 1) \cdot \Lambda_r(1) \end{aligned}Pr​(ωr+1​,ωr+2​,…,ωn​)​=(1−ωr+1​)⋅Pr,0​(ωr+2​,…,ωn​)+ωr+1​⋅Pr,1​(ωr+2​,…,ωn​)=(1−ωr+1​)⋅Λr​(0)+ωr+1​⋅Λr​(1)=L(ωr+1​,0)⋅Λr​(0)+L(ωr+1​,1)⋅Λr​(1)​
rrr

children.value: 轮的 sumcheck 是满足的：

\begin{aligned}
    L(\omega_{1}, \ldots, \omega_{r}, \lambda_1, \ldots, \lambda_r) &\cdot P_r(\omega_{r + 1}, \omega_{r + 2}, \ldots, \omega_n)  \\
    & = L(\omega_{1}, \ldots, \omega_{r}, \lambda_1, \ldots, \lambda_r) \cdot L(\omega_{r + 1}, 0) \cdot \Lambda_r(0) \\
    & \quad +  L(\omega_{1}, \ldots, \omega_{r}, \lambda_1, \ldots, \lambda_r) \cdot L(\omega_{r + 1}, 1) \cdot \Lambda_r(1) \\
    & = q_r(0) + q_r(1) \\
    & = q_{r - 1}(\lambda_r)
\end{aligned}
children.html: L(ω1,…,ωr,λ1,…,λr)⋅Pr(ωr+1,ωr+2,…,ωn)=L(ω1,…,ωr,λ1,…,λr)⋅L(ωr+1,0)⋅Λr(0)+L(ω1,…,ωr,λ1,…,λr)⋅L(ωr+1,1)⋅Λr(1)=qr(0)+qr(1)=qr−1(λr)\begin{aligned} L(\omega_{1}, \ldots, \omega_{r}, \lambda_1, \ldots, \lambda_r) &\cdot P_r(\omega_{r + 1}, \omega_{r + 2}, \ldots, \omega_n) \\ & = L(\omega_{1}, \ldots, \omega_{r}, \lambda_1, \ldots, \lambda_r) \cdot L(\omega_{r + 1}, 0) \cdot \Lambda_r(0) \\ & \quad + L(\omega_{1}, \ldots, \omega_{r}, \lambda_1, \ldots, \lambda_r) \cdot L(\omega_{r + 1}, 1) \cdot \Lambda_r(1) \\ & = q_r(0) + q_r(1) \\ & = q_{r - 1}(\lambda_r) \end{aligned}L(ω1​,…,ωr​,λ1​,…,λr​)​⋅Pr​(ωr+1​,ωr+2​,…,ωn​)=L(ω1​,…,ωr​,λ1​,…,λr​)⋅L(ωr+1​,0)⋅Λr​(0)+L(ω1​,…,ωr​,λ1​,…,λr​)⋅L(ωr+1​,1)⋅Λr​(1)=qr​(0)+qr​(1)=qr−1​(λr​)​
rrr

children.value: 轮的 sumcheck 是满足的，接下来需要考虑折叠关系是否满足。考虑

children.html: x∈π−1(Ar)x \in \pi^{-1}(A_r)x∈π−1(Ar​)

children.value:
\begin{aligned}
    & \frac{|\{x \in \pi^{-r}(A_r): \text{all folding checks hold for } f_0, \ldots, f_r \}|}{|D_0|} \\
    & = \frac{1}{|D_0|} \cdot \sum_{y \in A_{r+1}} \delta(y) \cdot |\pi^{-(r+1)}(y)| \\
    & = \frac{2^{r + 1}}{|D_0|} \cdot \sum_{y \in A_{r+1}} \delta(y) \\
    & =  \frac{1}{|D_{r + 1}|} \cdot \sum_{y \in A_{r+1}} \delta(y) \\
    & = \nu_r(A_{r+1})
\end{aligned}
children.html: ∣{x∈π−r(Ar):all folding checks hold for f0,…,fr}∣∣D0∣=1∣D0∣⋅∑y∈Ar+1δ(y)⋅∣π−(r+1)(y)∣=2r+1∣D0∣⋅∑y∈Ar+1δ(y)=1∣Dr+1∣⋅∑y∈Ar+1δ(y)=νr(Ar+1)\begin{aligned} & \frac{|\{x \in \pi^{-r}(A_r): \text{all folding checks hold for } f_0, \ldots, f_r \}|}{|D_0|} \\ & = \frac{1}{|D_0|} \cdot \sum_{y \in A_{r+1}} \delta(y) \cdot |\pi^{-(r+1)}(y)| \\ & = \frac{2^{r + 1}}{|D_0|} \cdot \sum_{y \in A_{r+1}} \delta(y) \\ & = \frac{1}{|D_{r + 1}|} \cdot \sum_{y \in A_{r+1}} \delta(y) \\ & = \nu_r(A_{r+1}) \end{aligned}​∣D0​∣∣{x∈π−r(Ar​):all folding checks hold for f0​,…,fr​}∣​=∣D0​∣1​⋅y∈Ar+1​∑​δ(y)⋅∣π−(r+1)(y)∣=∣D0​∣2r+1​⋅y∈Ar+1​∑​δ(y)=∣Dr+1​∣1​⋅y∈Ar+1​∑​δ(y)=νr​(Ar+1​)​

children.value: 轮引理也是成立的。从而得证引理成立。
[H24] Ulrich Haböck. “Basefold in the List Decoding Regime.”
